title: Get "Couldn't Process Fingerprint. Please try again."
content:
I've had my Pixel 2 XL for about a year, and it has been awesome. About a week ago, the fingerprint sensor has stopped working. Each time I try to unlock it, I don't get the confirmation vibration and instead it says "Couldn't process fingerprint. Please try again." 

When this first happened, if restarted the phone it would work once or twice (after I initially used the pin to log in) but then go back to not processing the fingerprint. It now won't even do that.

I booted it into safe mode, but it didn't work in safe mode either. 

Any recommendations?
